about_the_game:
A Horror game for PC and Mac.

Navigate the narrow hallways in the darkness to find and rescue Jessica and along the way you must...well...you'll see...

Headphones recommended for best experience. This game contains flashing lights, loud noises, and blood.

Controls:
W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move
Spacebar or Enter/OK button to interact
hold Shift to run
Gamepad

Dpad or L-Stick to move
bottom button to interact
hold left button to run
This is my first time making a horror game. Hopefully I did alright...It scared the pants off me, but I'm a big baby, so...

Mac Troubleshooting:
If you can't open the file: right click and select open.
If you see "move this app to another folder" you must move the app itself out of it's original folder, either to a new folder, or away from it's original folder.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains flashing lights, disturbing imagery, blood, and journal logs that describe things like torture, experimentation, and disturbing science experiments. The majority of this game takes place in narrow hallways and monsters chasing you which may invoke feelings of paranoia, claustrophobia, and panic.

A Horror game for PC and Mac.

Navigate the narrow hallways in the darkness to find and rescue Jessica and along the way you must...well...you'll see...

This is my first time making a horror game. Hopefully I did alright...It scared the pants off me, but I'm a big baby, so...

Mac Troubleshooting:
If you can't open the file: right click and select open.
If you see "move this app to another folder" you must move the app itself out of it's original folder, either to a new folder, or away from it's original folder.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: They Linger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Navigate the narrow hallways in the darkness to find and rescue Jessica and survive the infinite Labyrinth.
